Reviews.Author: John M. Stigleman
Reviews.Content: They only con I have with the IPad Air, is that I can not do my online math homework on it. Hawking Learning System does not have a app. for it yet.  It very fast surfing the web, playing games, movies,  and playing music. I owned a first generation kindle fire for a couple years. So the Ipad Air is a large improvement over the kindle.
Reviews.Title: Enjoy it

Reviews.Author: Peter M.
Reviews.Content: It's very good in speed and screen resolution is fantastic. Pictures and photos are very clear. I have recommended it to friends.
Reviews.Title: I pad air review

ProductInfo.Features:
Factory Unlocked iPad Air 4G LTE, Works Worldwide with Micro Sim Card; Works on All GSM and CDMA Networks. Unactivated AT&T; Sim Card Included.
Apple iOS 7; 9.7 Retina display; 2048 x 1536 resolution
A7 chip with 64-bit architecture and M7 motion coprocessor
Wi-Fi (802.11a/b/g/n) + 4G LTE Cellular; 128 GB Capacity, 1GB Ram
5 MP iSight camera; 1080p HD video recording, 10 Hours Battery Life
ProductInfo.Name: Factory Unlocked Apple iPad AIR MF016LL/A (128GB, Wi-Fi + 4G LTE, Black with Space Gray) Newest Version
